title: 680 52 "The Devil's Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!"Transliteration: "Akuma no Wana - Doresurōza Senmetsu Sakusen" (Japanese:悪魔の罠 ドレスローザ殲滅作戦) Directed by: Satoshi ItōStoryboarded by:Masayoshi Nishida Tomohiro Nakayama February 1, 2015(2015-02-01) August 18, 2024
transformers_text: 680 52 The Devil's Trap A Dress rosa Extermination Plan Transliteration A kuma no Wana Dore sur za Sen mets u Sak use n Japanese Directed by Satoshi It Story boarded by Masa yoshi Nishida Tomohiro Nakayama February 1 2015 2015 02 01 August 18 2024 Do flamingo reveals that what Kyro s decapitated was only a clone made of string and orders Pica to push Luffy and the others off of the palace Do flamingo then unleashes his Birdcage sealing the entire island in strings The strings then latch on to people and take control of them forcing them to attack each other Pica then rearranges the whole island levitating areas such as the palace and the Flower Field Do flamingo announces a game to kill him to break the cage unless they kill all of the people he is about to name
tf_idf_text: devil trap dress rosa extermination plan transliteration kuma wana dore sur sen mets sak use japanese direct satoshi story board masa yoshi nishida tomohiro nakayama february august flamingo reveals kyro decapitate clone make string order pica push luffy others palace flamingo unleashes birdcage seal entire island string string latch people take control force attack pica rearrange whole island levitate area palace flower field flamingo announces game kill break cage unless kill people name
